server.name: Cobbler
server.description: the local file used for mapping modules and setttings

c:simple-property.name: augeasModuleName
c:simple-property.description: the name of the Augeas module/lens to use for loading and updating this Resource's configuration

c:simple-property.name: configurationFilesInclusionPatterns
c:simple-property.description: the absolute paths of the configuration files, delimited with pipe characters; wildcards are permitted in the last component of the path (e.g. /etc/cron.d/*)

c:simple-property.name: settings/server
c:simple-property.description: The IP address of the cobbler server.

c:simple-property.name: settings/http_port
c:simple-property.description: The default port to use to download Kickstart Files.

c:simple-property.name: settings/default_kickstart
c:simple-property.description: The path to the kicktart template that will be used if no kickstart file is provided to a kickstart profile.

c:simple-property.name: settings/snippetsdir
c:simple-property.description: The directory of files that cobbler uses to make templating of kickstarts easier. For more information check https://fedorahosted.org/cobbler/wiki/KickstartSnippets

c:simple-property.name: modules.conf/authentication/module
c:simple-property.description: The name of the module that authenticates the allowable users that can log into the cobbler WebUI and Read-Write XMLRPC. Choose one of authn_denyall, authn_configfile, authn_passthru, authn_ldap, authn_spacewalk, authn_testing, or a user supplied authentication scheme.

c:simple-property.name: modules.conf/authorization/module
c:simple-property.description: The name of the module that specifies the operations an authenticated user can do in cobbler. Choose one of authz_allowall, authz_ownership, or a user supplied authentication scheme.

c:simple-property.name: settings/manage_dhcp
c:simple-property.description: True if dhcp management is to be enabled. Note the DHCP module must be appropriately selected.

c:simple-property.name: modules.conf/dhcp/module
c:simple-property.description: Chooses the DHCP management engine if manage_dhcp is enabled in /etc/cobbler/settings. For more information check https://fedorahosted.org/cobbler/wiki/ManageDhcp

c:simple-property.name: settings/next_server
c:simple-property.description: The IP address of the cobbler server which will be used by guests who are booting via PXE.

c:simple-property.name: settings/manage_dns
c:simple-property.description: True if dns management is to be enabled. Note the DNS module must be appropriately selected.

c:simple-property.name: modules.conf/dns/module
c:simple-property.description: Chooses the DNS management engine if manage_dns is enabled in /etc/cobbler/settings. For more information check https://fedorahosted.org/cobbler/wiki/ManageDns

c:simple-property.name: settings/manage_forward_zones
c:simple-property.description: If using BIND (named) for DNS management, this is a list of zone that are to be managed. For more information check https://fedorahosted.org/cobbler/wiki/ManageDns

c:simple-property.name: settings/manage_reverse_zones
c:simple-property.description: If using BIND (named) for DNS management, this is a list of zone that are to be managed. For more information check https://fedorahosted.org/cobbler/wiki/ManageDns

c:simple-property.name: settings/default_virt_bridge
c:simple-property.description: The default virtualization brige to use if no value is specified in the profile/system record. For EL 4/5 hosts this should be xenbr0. For fedora try virbr0

c:simple-property.name: settings/default_virt_file_size
c:simple-property.description: Default disk size for virt guests (GB).

c:simple-property.name: settings/default_virt_ram
c:simple-property.description: Default memory size for virt guests (MB).

c:simple-property.name: settings/default_virt_type
c:simple-property.description: Default virtualization type if no virt type is specified in the profile/system.
